price: “Nta bwugamo gitanga ndetse nta n’ubwo kirinda ikibatsi cy’umuriro”,
arabic: لَّا ظَلِيلٖ وَلَا يُغۡنِي مِنَ ٱللَّهَبِ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: lā ẓalīlin walā yugh'nī mina al-lahabi
